es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.fast.preference

Class SimpleFastPreferenceData<U,I>

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.fast.preference.AbstractFastPreferenceData<U,I>
      • es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.fast.preference.SimpleFastPreferenceData<U,I>
  • Type Parameters:
    U - type of the users
    I - type of the items
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ItemIndex<I>, UserIndex<U>, PreferenceData<U,I>, FastItemIndex<I>, FastUserIndex<U>, FastPreferenceData<U,I>, Serializable

    public class SimpleFastPreferenceData<U,I>
extends AbstractFastPreferenceData<U,I>
implements Serializable
    Simple implementation of FastPreferenceData backed by nested lists.
    Author:
    Sa√∫l Vargas (saul.vargas@uam.es)

      • load

        public static <U,I> SimpleFastPreferenceData<U,I> load(String path,
                                                       Parser<U> uParser,
                                                       Parser<I> iParser,
                                                       DoubleParser dp,
                                                       FastUserIndex<U> uIndex,
                                                       FastItemIndex<I> iIndex)
                                                throws IOException
        Load preferences from a file. Each line is a different preference, with tab-separated fields indicating user, item, weight and other information.
        Type Parameters:
        U - type of the users
        I - type of the items
        Parameters:
        path - path of the input file
        uParser - user type parser
        iParser - item type parser
        dp - double parse
        uIndex - user index
        iIndex - item index
        Returns:
        a simple list-of-lists FastPreferenceData with the information read
        Throws:
        IOException - when path does not exists of IO error

      • load

        public static <U,I> SimpleFastPreferenceData<U,I> load(InputStream in,
                                                       Parser<U> uParser,
                                                       Parser<I> iParser,
                                                       DoubleParser dp,
                                                       FastUserIndex<U> uIndex,
                                                       FastItemIndex<I> iIndex)
                                                throws IOException
        Load preferences from an input stream. Each line is a different preference, with tab-separated fields indicating user, item, weight and other information.
        Type Parameters:
        U - type of the users
        I - type of the items
        Parameters:
        in - input stream to read from
        uParser - user type parser
        iParser - item type parser
        dp - double parse
        uIndex - user index
        iIndex - item index
        Returns:
        a simple list-of-lists FastPreferenceData with the information read
        Throws:
        IOException - when path does not exists of IO error
